statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_metadata WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM sensor_metadata WHERE location = 'Room A';
SELECT sensor_name, acquisition_date FROM sensor_metadata WHERE sensor_id IN (2, 3);
SELECT sensor_name AS Name, location AS Location FROM sensor_metadata WHERE acquisition_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sensor_metadata ORDER BY location DESC, sensor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_metadata WHERE sensor_name = 'Temperature Sensor' ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensor_metadata WHERE location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, location, acquisition_date FROM sensor_metadata WHERE location LIKE '%Lab%' AND acquisition_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sensor_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sensors FROM sensor_metadata;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensor_metadata WHERE location IS NOT NULL AND sensor_name <> 'Humidity Sensor' ORDER BY location, sensor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_id FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_name ASC
SELECT acquisition_date, sensor_name FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name LIKE 'Sensor%'
SELECT * FROM acquisition_sites
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM sensor_data WHERE acquisition_date >= '2021-01-01' AND acquisition_date <= '2021-12-31'
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM acquisition_sites ORDER BY site_name ASC
SELECT sensor_name, acquisition_date FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT * FROM acquisition_sites
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location, date_acquired FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 2;
SELECT sensor_name, location, date_acquired FROM sensors ORDER BY date_acquired DESC;
SELECT s.sensor_name, m.metadata_description FROM sensors s JOIN sensor_metadata m ON s.sensor_id = m.sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_name, location, date_acquired FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_name LIKE 'Sen%';
SELECT sensor_name, location, acquisition_date FROM sensors JOIN acquisition_dates ON sensors.sensor_id = acquisition_dates.sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_name, metadata_description FROM sensors JOIN sensor_metadata ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_metadata.sensor_id WHERE metadata_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT sensor_name, acquisition_date FROM sensor_information
SELECT sensor_id, data_value FROM sensor_data WHERE data_value > 100
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM sensor_location ORDER BY latitude DESC
SELECT metadata_type, metadata_value FROM sensor_metadata WHERE metadata_type='temperature'
SELECT * FROM sensor_data INNER JOIN sensor_information ON sensor_data.sensor_id = sensor_information.sensor_id
SELECT * FROM sensor_information
SELECT sensor_name, acquisition_date FROM sensor_information WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT sensor_name, data_value, data_timestamp FROM sensor_information INNER JOIN sensor_data ON sensor_information.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id
SELECT sensor_name, metadata_type, metadata_value FROM sensor_information INNER JOIN sensor_metadata ON sensor_information.sensor_id = sensor_metadata.sensor_id
SELECT sensor_name, latitude, longitude FROM sensor_information INNER JOIN sensor_location ON sensor_information.sensor_id = sensor_location.sensor_id
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, acquisition_date FROM sensors ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, acquisition_date FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type='Temperature';
SELECT s.sensor_id, s.sensor_name, l.location_name FROM sensors s JOIN sensor_locations sl ON s.sensor_id = sl.sensor_id JOIN locations l ON sl.location_id = l.location_id;
SELECT sensor_name, acquisition_date FROM sensors ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC;
SELECT s.sensor_name, a.data_type, m.value FROM sensors s JOIN acquisitions a ON s.sensor_id = a.sensor_id JOIN measurements m ON a.acquisition_id = m.acquisition_id WHERE m.value > 100;
